# log-summarizer

Summarize noisy logs into likely causes and next steps. Use when a junior developer needs help interpreting logs.

## Quick Facts
- id: `log-summarizer--da942eeb86`
- worth_using_score: `20/100`
- source: `agent_playground`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/codex/agent_playground/source/agents/frameworks/Spinnybot/skills-selected/log-summarizer/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Group similar errors and identify the first failure.
- Translate error messages into likely causes.
- Suggest immediate checks or fixes.
